head.supplied: ¶ We the undersigned beg to propose ¶ : ¶ ¶ John Forrest Esqr., Gold-medalist and F.RGS, Chevalier of the Order of the Italian Crown, Hon. Member of the Royal Italian Geographic Society, &c to the h...

div.p: To the Linnean Society of London
Linnean Society, London, Certificates of Fellows, Foreign Members and Asociates, 1877-82.

The MS is in M's hand; the other supporters have signed individually.
We the undersigned beg to propose
For Election added in pencil by (?)B. Jackson after ‘propose’. :

John Forrest Esqr., Gold-medalist and F.RGS, Chevalier of the Order of the Italian Crown, Hon. Member of the Royal Italian Geographic Society, &c to the honor of being elected a fellow of the Linnean Society of London, In consideration of his efforts for the elucidation of Australian plants during his extensive geographical journeys.

div.p:
Robert Fitzgerald, F.L.S.
Forrest was proposed on 20 May 1881 and elected on 16 June.
